GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.22 to before v4.14.291
GSD.description:
video: fbdev: arkfb: Check the size of screen before memset_io()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.291 by commit 4a20c5510aa2c031a096a58deb356e91609781c9, it was introduced in version v2.6.22 by commit 681e14730c73cc2c71af282c001de6bc71c22f00. For more details please see the references link.
